creator: 宇文張
title: Chinese New Year Project-Firecrackers and monster Nian
description: This project, "Firecrackers and Monster Nian," recreates the Chinese New Year tradition of scaring away the monster Nian with firecrackers and red decorations. The design includes a firecracker protruding from a mansion and the scared monster Nian.
steps: Brainstorm ideas related to the Spring Festival and the legend of Nian.
Design the project with two main parts: a firecracker extending from a building and a scared Nian monster. Consider both 2D and 3D modeling.
Create a prototype to test the functionality of moving parts and make necessary adjustments.
Enhance the appearance of the design by incorporating traditional Chinese aesthetics.
Focus on the details of the project, such as the eaves and couplets of the house, and manually attach them.
